title: How to Do the Saber Expert Puzzle & Get the Saber in Blox Fruits

steps.title: Get to level 200
steps.content: Get to level 200 . While you don't need to be level 200 to do most of the puzzle to obtain the Saber, you do need to be level 200 to defeat the Saber Expert boss. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Activate all the green buttons in the Jungle.
steps.content: Activate all the green buttons in the Jungle. There are five green buttons you must activate in the Jungle to start this puzzle. Buttons will be bright green if you haven't stepped on them, and dark green if you have. The button locations are as follows: Under a bush near a stone ruin in the north-east part of the big island On a tree in on the eastern part of the big island On a stone building near the middle of the map, near the Blox Fruits Dealers Cousin On a tree near where Gorillas spawn on the north-east part of the small island On the stone beach near the makeshift dock in the south part of the small island

steps.title: Go to the house in the middle of the island.
steps.content: Go to the house in the middle of the island. This is the quest giver NPC house and it's located above the lake.

steps.title: Walk down the stairs and go into the hole on the floor.
steps.content: Walk down the stairs and go into the hole on the floor. This hole is not present unless you press all five buttons.

steps.title: Grab the torch in this room.
steps.content: Grab the torch in this room. There is a poem on the wall that is a hint to the next step—you'll need to go to Desert Island.

steps.title: Go to Desert Island and look for a house with a red door.
steps.content: Go to Desert Island and look for a house with a red door. This is the house mentioned in the poem.

steps.title: Enter the house and hold your torch up to the brown curtain inside the house.
steps.content: Enter the house and hold your torch up to the brown curtain inside the house. The torch will burn down the curtain, revealing a secret room.

steps.title: Take the cup inside the room.
steps.content: Take the cup inside the room. There is a poem on the wall that is a hint towards the next step, which requires you to head to the Frozen Village. To equip the cup, stand on it or click on it.

steps.title: Go to the Frozen Village and enter the cave with the Ability Teacher.
steps.content: Go to the Frozen Village and enter the cave with the Ability Teacher. The entrance to this cave is on the side of a cliff near the village.

steps.title: Catch a drop of water from the ice stalactite.
steps.content: Catch a drop of water from the ice stalactite. You just need one drop of water from the icicle to fill the cup. If you don't have the cup equipped, you won't see the ice stalactite.

steps.title: Go to the village.
steps.content: Go to the village. The village is located on top of the rocks above the cave.

steps.title: Enter the house to the right of the pine tree.
steps.content: Enter the house to the right of the pine tree. You know you're in the correct house if there is a Sick Man NPC inside.

steps.title: Help the Sick Man.
steps.content: Help the Sick Man. Interact with the Sick Man and help him with the cup. After doing so, the man will say "Thank you so much! Please meet up with my son, I'm sure he will reward you."

steps.title: Go to the Pirate Village.
steps.content: Go to the Pirate Village. Enter the village to locate the Rich Man NPC.

steps.title: Talk to the Rich Man.
steps.content: Talk to the Rich Man. The Rich Man will say "Thanks for helping my father, but a mob leader has stolen all my money! Please find and take him down as soon as possible so I can reward you…"

steps.title: Leave the Pirate Village and go to Jean Luc Island.
steps.content: Leave the Pirate Village and go to Jean Luc Island. Jean Luc Island is a secret island, and it's southwest of Pirate Village (in the same direction as Magma Village).

steps.title: Defeat the Mob Leader on Jean Luc Island.
steps.content: Defeat the Mob Leader on Jean Luc Island. The Mob Leader is a level 120 boss with 2,600 health. He's a relatively easy boss for players to defeat, and he respawns every minute as he's an essential part of the Saber Quest. [2] X Research source If you get to Jean Luc Island and the Mob Leader isn't there, simply wait for a minute or less for him to respawn.

steps.title: Return to Pirate Village and talk to the Rich Man.
steps.content: Return to Pirate Village and talk to the Rich Man. The Rich Man will give you the Ancient Relic, which allows you to access the final part of the Saber Expert Puzzle.

steps.title: Go back to the Jungle.
steps.content: Go back to the Jungle. The Saber Expert is located in the stone building near the Blox Fruit Gacha.

steps.title: Enter the building and use the relic on the hole in the wall near the stairs.
steps.content: Enter the building and use the relic on the hole in the wall near the stairs. Once you use the relic on the hole, a secret door will open and the Saber Expert will be inside. If the Saber Expert isn't inside, wait for him to respawn. The Saber Expert respawns every 30 minutes.

steps.title: Defeat the Saber Expert.
steps.content: Defeat the Saber Expert. The Saber Expert is a difficult boss, and has 11,000 HP. He has one special attack, Air Slash; when he swings his sword, a red slash of air will move towards the player. It's recommended to dash when the Saber Expert is using Air Slash to dodge it. One method to defeat the Saber Expert is to stand just outside the door and hit him, as he can't leave the room. However, if you go too far outside of the room, the Saber Expert will regenerate in the middle of his spawn room with 100% health. Another method to defeat the Saber Expert involves getting him stuck on the square bump in between the stairs. He can still hit you with his ranged move, but he is much easier to beat when stuck. You must do at least 10% damage to the Saber Expert to get the Saber, if you're fighting him with other users. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Claim your Saber.
steps.content: Claim your Saber. Once you defeat the Saber Expert, the Saber is a guaranteed drop. To upgrade your Saber to Saber V2, you must earn 1 million bounty/honor and kill another player with a similar level. [4] X Research source
